<page title>: Cleverboxes - 858-10254 | Dell Professional P2012H (20 inch) LED Monitor 1000:1 250cd/m2 1600x900 5ms DVI-D Black (UK)
description: The Dell P2012H was designed to keep your business productive, efficient and aligned with your environmentally-responsible preferences. Its power management features help conserve energy and monetary resources. The P2012H monitor features environmentally-preferable materials, such as an arsenic-free and mercury-free LED panel and more than 25% post-consumer recycled plastics in its chassis. Get power-saving features like PowerNap software, which when enabled, dims the monitor or puts it to sleep when not in use. Dynamic dimming reduces on-screen brightness when images contain large bright areas. The P2012H monitor also meets the latest environmental standards, such as ENERGY STAR , EPEAT Gold and TCO Certified Displays.
in the box: Monitor with stand • Power Cable • DVI Cable • USB Cable • VGA Cable • Drivers and Documentation media • Quick Setup Guide • Safety Information
